ach_01.name: Climbing the ladder
ach_01.anotation: Team was ranked amongst the top 50.

ach_17.name: Nasty Squad
ach_17.anotation: The average player personality in your squad is close to nasty.

ach_18.name: Honest Squad
ach_18.anotation: The average player personality in your squad is close to righteous.

ach_19.name: Nice Squad
ach_19.anotation: The average player personality in your squad is close to popular.

ach_20.name: Dishonest Squad
ach_20.anotation: The average player personality in your squad is close to infamous.

ach_22.name: Star collector
ach_22.anotation: Team reached at least 90 stars in a .

ach_23.name: All that skill
ach_23.anotation: Total TSI of the squad exceeded 2 000 000.

ach_25.name: Home-grown lineup
ach_25.anotation: All players in your starting originate from your own club and the average age is over 18. Please note that there must be 11 players in your starting lineup to complete this achievement.

ach_26.name: Veteran lineup
ach_26.anotation: The average age of your starting is over 35. Please note: only full years, not days, are taken into account for this achievement, and there must be 11 players in your starting lineup to complete this achievement.

ach_27.name: Youthful lineup
ach_27.anotation: The average age of your starting is below 18 (and at least one player started his career at another club). Please note: only full years, not days, are taken into account for this achievement, and there must be 11 players in your starting lineup to complete this achievement.

ach_28.name: Academy lineup
ach_28.anotation: All players in your starting originate from your own club and the average age is below 18. Please note that there must be 11 players in your starting lineup to complete this achievement.

ach_29.name:
You're in the Book!
(replaced by nr .47)

ach_31.name: Cash is king
ach_31.anotation: The money in your account exceeded 400 000 000 Kč on the weekly update

ach_33.name: Eternal life
ach_33.anotation: Promoted to the hall of fame.

ach_37.name: Great Cup Season
ach_37.anotation: Get as close as you can to winning the National Cup. First level is reached if you win when there are 7 rounds left, then you gain one level for each round closer you get. Last level means you won the Cup.

ach_38.name: Great Cup Streak
ach_38.anotation: Achieve a long streak of wins in the National Cup. Win streaks carry over from one season to the next.

ach_39.name: Wipe that smile off your face
ach_39.anotation: End the undefeated streak of another team by winning one against it. The longer the streak you end, the stronger your achievement.

ach_40.name: Winning is What Counts
ach_40.anotation: Just keep winning. The achievement counts your team's lifetime wins, official matches only.

ach_41.name: Scoring Out of Bounds
ach_41.anotation: All time goals by your team in official matches

ach_42.name: Special Ops
ach_42.anotation: Win any having scored only Special Event goals.

ach_43.name: Comeback Kings
ach_43.anotation: Given to teams that achieved were behind by several goals, and then swung the around. The more dramatic the comeback, the better.

ach_44.name: We're Bigger Than Hattrick
ach_44.anotation: When one Hattrick in a match is not enough. Your team needs to score two in the same to get this honour.

ach_45.name: That's Just Typical
ach_45.anotation: Your team has a with lots of injuries. This achievement is the consolation prize.

ach_46.name: Vox Populi
ach_46.anotation: Submit an to Hattrick Press, have it accepted and read by the community. The more likes an article gets, the higher your achievement level.

ach_47.name: You're in the Book!
ach_47.anotation: Be an active and constructive member of the forum, so other users will bookmark you to see what you have to say

ach_48.name: Official Business
ach_48.anotation: A tally of all official matches played by your team

ach_50.name: I only have eyes for you

ach_51.name: The Football Laboratory
ach_51.anotation: Win at least one league match with each one of the 10 default formations. A single formation should be used for the whole match.

ach_52.name: Movember Has Come
ach_52.anotation: Have a perfectly groomed team lined up for a . Yes, we mean moustaches.

ach_54.name: Past My Bedtime
ach_54.anotation: Log in to Hattrick at midnight, local time.

ach_55.name: Everyone Is Welcome Here
ach_55.anotation: Collect a home flag for every country in Hattrick

ach_56.name: Grand Tour
ach_56.anotation: Collect an away flag from every country in Hattrick

ach_57.name: Continent Hopper
ach_57.anotation: Collect one home and one away flag from each of six continents: North America, South America, Europe, Africa, Asia and Oceania

ach_58.name: Never Alone
ach_58.anotation: Consistency is key. Play at least one friendly per week, for several weeks in a row. Weekend friendlies also count if for whatever reason you happen to miss playing a midweek friendly. The longer you keep it up the higher you will rank.

ach_59.name: Shut-Out Season
ach_59.anotation: Become the champion in your while being undefeated in all league matches that season

ach_60.name: Safety First
ach_60.anotation: Finish a with less than 10 goals conceded in league matches.

ach_62.name: Golden Bonanza
ach_62.anotation: Win the series while also having the Top Scorer on your team

ach_63.name: Goal Machine
ach_63.anotation: Simply have your team score many goals in league matches in the . The more goals, the higher your rank.

ach_64.name: Entry Denied
ach_64.anotation: Awarded when you have had a certain number of clean sheets in official matches. Higher ranks are given as you achieve more clean sheets.

ach_65.name: It's Me, Again
ach_65.anotation: Awarded when you have the Top Scorer for the season in your team. Higher ranks available when the feat is repeated.

ach_67.name: Rocket Fuel
ach_67.anotation: Your team was promoted two seasons in a row.

ach_68.name: National Treasure Hunter
ach_68.anotation: The achievement awards you for the best result (round reached) with a U21 or NT team as their National Coach.

ach_69.name: Always There For You
ach_69.anotation: Visit Hattrick every day. Achievement given when you have achieved a log-in streak of several days. The longer your streak, the higher your rank.

ach_70.name: Hometown Heroes
ach_70.anotation: Win your series using only homegrown players in your starting lineup the entire season.

ach_71.name: Local Delicacies
ach_71.anotation: Players raised in your team have played at least 3 matches for a national team (U21 or senior). Having more players with caps leads to higher ranks.

ach_73.name: So close!
ach_73.anotation: Losing a was harsh, but at least you got this achievement.

ach_74.name: Penalty Pickings
ach_74.anotation: A tally of penalties scored in official matches. Penalty shoot-outs are not included.

ach_75.name: Kissing the Badge
ach_75.anotation: Created a team logo for your team using the Club Logo Editor.

ach_76.name: Field of Dreams
ach_76.anotation: Used the Arena Designer to create or update the arena of your team.

ach_79.name: Easter Egg Hunt
ach_79.anotation: Found Easter eggs hidden around the site during the Easter hunt.
